name: Rite as Rain
description:
The weather is yours to control... how will you use it?

Rite as Rain is a whimsical turn-based open world game where you, Eira, are tasked with stopping elemental spirts gone awry. Solve puzzles, help villagers, and decide the fate of your enemies. Will you choose the light, or let darkness consume you?

Use your weather magic to solve puzzles and interact with your environment. Explore the world to discover clues to solve puzzles. Find magical potions to help you survive dangerous battles with elemental enemies. Explore the vast villages within Estelia, and interact with a variety of villagers! When battle is required, use your magic to fight enemies using turn-based combat with your familiar, Looney the cat!
